name: HouseTour 1.1
description:
In this game you get to find eggs while wandering through a house.

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move, spacebar to shift the camera, and click eggs with the mouse to collect them. The downloadable file, House Tour 1.1d, is a desktop version for those who prefer not to play in-browser.

My sister, H.H.Magoo, encouraged me to try programming, an effort I began in November 2020. She's also encouraged me to submit this in a Jam, (Re)vision Jam 2. Since this is a new project, I'm putting it into the Vision stream. I don't know if I'll add to this game specifically, but the skills I've learned while making it will go into a larger-scale game I have in mind.

I made the house model in SketchUp, the music in MuseScore, and the game itself in Unity.
